Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sathyamoorthy Ganapathy
Reviews.Content: it was good and now started to use will not take more time for me to provide the right now what our eyes really good and very easy to use

Reviews.Title: Case no good
Reviews.Author: Christina Koch
Reviews.Content: The kit was great except for the camera case which was quickly resolved.  Thank You .  Happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: S. Moore "HerValkyrie"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He really enjoys it, but has a problem seeing the screen in bright sunlight.  Takes beautiful pictures and has a great zoom.

Reviews.Title: Canon purchase
Reviews.Author: Roger J Caillouet III
Reviews.Content: Everything came as described and the camera works great.  The only issue was with he camera case.  It was much too small for the SX510 HS.  I did have an old camcorder case which works perfect and the small case fits our Kodak digital.

Reviews.Title: First Class Products
Reviews.Author: Jim Carroll
Reviews.Content: I am still learning to use this product but the quality is first class.  I look forward to using during the holidays.

ProductInfo.Features:
Carl Zeiss mid-range zoom lens
High lens technology in a compact body
Optical Steady Shot image stabilization
ProductInfo.Name: Canon Powershot SX510 HS CMOS 12.1MP 1080p 30x Optical Zoom Digital Camera + Additional Battery + 16GB Memory Card + Camera Case + Accessory Kit
